name: Lost In Notes
description: Lost In Notes Lost In Notes is A little puzzle game made for the UoM annual Game-Jam. The theme for the Jam was "Lost In Translation", the game has been made in 3 days and is about a guy who wake up and see that her mother put a lock on the fridge to stop him from eating too much, in this game you'r the guy and you must find a way to open the fridge.
